Lonza offered a one—time “window” program to deferred vested participants in the US. pensions plans, permitting them to elect a one-time immediate lump sum payment (or immediate annuity) of their retirement beneﬁt in lieu of a lifetime annuity beginning at retirement age, which resulted in a gain on settlement of CHF 4 million.

The Group expects to pay CHF 90 million in contributions to deﬁned—beneﬁt pension plans in 2018.
